# The `Instruction` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An instruction propagated through the simulated instruction pipeline. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An instruction propagated through the simulated instruction pipeline.

This class is used to monitor changes to the internal state of instructions that are sent to the various components of the simulated hardware pipeline.

Definition at line 600 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/instruction-h">Instruction.h</a>.
